<title level="1" pfs="">[Dark Talon Kobold](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2168)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 21

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 19

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Dark Talon Kobold](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2168)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Crown of the Kobold King](/Sources.aspx?ID=148) pg. 59</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Flying Talon](/Weapons.aspx?ID=255), studded leather

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +9 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 26

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flying talon +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flying talon +10 ([Ranged Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=251), [Tethered](/Traits.aspx?ID=252), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 piercing

**No Retreat** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Frequency** once per day; **Requirement** The Dark Talon kobold is adjacent to at least one enemy, and the Dark Talon has fewer than 12 Hit Points; **Effect** The Dark Talon shrieks in fury and regains 2d6 Hit Points.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   A Dark Talon kobold deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-65" />
name: Dark Talon Kobold

text: Dark Talon Kobold Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 21 Unspecific Lore : DC 19 Specific Lore : DC 16 Dark Talon Kobold Source Crown of the Kobold King pg. 59 Perception +8; darkvision Languages Common, Draconic Skills Acrobatics +8, Athletics +7, Crafting +6, Stealth +8, Survival +8 Str +1 Dex +4 Con +3 Int +0 Wis +2 Cha +0 Items Flying Talon, studded leather --- AC 19 Fort +9 Ref +10 Will +6 HP 26 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action flying talon +10 (Finesse, Trip), Damage 1d4+3 piercing Ranged Single Action flying talon +10 (Ranged Trip, Tethered, thrown 10 feet), Damage 1d4+3 piercing No Retreat Single Action (Necromancy, Primal) Frequency once per day; Requirement The Dark Talon kobold is adjacent to at least one enemy, and the Dark Talon has fewer than 12 Hit Points; Effect The Dark Talon shrieks in fury and regains 2d6 Hit Points.
